Most Popular.Description: While attempting to move in with his girlfriend, Manvir finds a homeowner who rents his house to married couples. Chaos ensues when Manvir fakes his marriage and the lies spiral out of his control.
A man falls in love whilst studying in Chandigarh, despite his marriage being arranged to another woman.
Ritik comes from a family in which men are inherently close-fisted. Bulbul is a free spender who never hesitates to indulge her whims and fancies. It is a match made with purse strings.
Lovely, a dark-complexioned man, gets married to Pammi, a beautiful girl. However, his bliss is short-lived as Pammi appears to be possessed by a spirit.
Nishana is an action packed drama story about two unemployed young boys from different villages who are frustrated from life. They come to a railway track for committing suicide.
Babbu is in love with Sargi since their college days. Sargi fakes a marriage to travel abroad to support her family, and is stuck between three eligible suitors who have fallen in love with her.
Mehtaab Singh is given the task of informing the family of his comrade about the latter's demise. Complications arise when he is forced to hide the truth and falls in love with his comrade's widow.
A traumatised young boy grows up to become a notorious gangster and sets out to seek revenge against the corrupt officials who destroyed his family.
A young man's plans to migrate to Canada are put on hold because of the IELTS exam. As he anticipates failing the exam due to his struggles with learning English, he enrols in an IELTS class.

Most Popular.Movie_name: Main Viyah Nahi Karona Tere Naal
Most Popular.Description: Sparks fly between two complete opposites, a Canadian YouTuber and a Punjabi girl who helps reconnect with his roots as they spend time with each other.
Two men are overpowered by the women in their house and hatch a plan to get their sister-in-law married in order to bring another man in.
A fierce competition ensues between best friends Jaggi and Pamma when they go to great lengths to impress the women they love.
A single father attempting to find love and a mother for his seven-year-old son runs into his ex, who's just returned to the city.
Upset about her son's decision to marry against her will, a woman plots to make her daughter-in-law miserable. However, her plans backfire when her daughter-in-law retaliates.
Chanan aspires to become a wrestler and follows his grandfather's footsteps. However, his life takes a turn when he is pitted against his girlfriend's brother in a competition.
Moosa, who is brought up by his uncle, finds out that his parents died due to the evil deeds of a land mafia. He then decides to bring the culprits to justice and protect the farmers from harassment.
Maya falls in love with Ronnie, a crime reporter, and gets obsessed with him. Things take a turn for the worse when they both get involved in a murder case.
Nimmi, an NRI, must marry a Punjabi man at her uncle's behest. So, she decides to marry Arjan, a man under debt, on paper as they both have something to gain from it.
After his father's demise due to poverty, Mukhtiar dreams of being wealthy and enters the real estate business. However, trouble ensues when he comes into conflict with a mafia group.
A short guy's romantic interest in a taller girl earns some criticism from her loved ones, but only time will tell if he succeeds in gaining their approval or if they end up broken-hearted.

Top Movies.Description: Chal Mera Putt 3 is a 2021 Indian Punjabi-language comedy-drama film directed by Janjot Singh. It is a direct sequel to 2020 film Chal Mera Putt 2. The film is produced by Karaj Gill under Rhythm Boyz Entertainment and by Ashu Munish Sahni under Omjee Star Studios.
Kullu, a pizza delivery boy meets Goli Badmaash, a notorious gangster. Soon, they realise they can help each other with their love lives.
Geja falls in love with Maarho. When her family learns of their relationship, it is scorned up. Before their love fully blooms, a rich man enters Maarho's life and Geja finds solace in Dhan Kaur.
Ashke is a film about the cultural dance "Bhangra," and also revolves around families, relationships and fun-loving comedy.
Lovely, a dark-complexioned man, gets married to Pammi, a beautiful girl. However, his bliss is short-lived as Pammi appears to be possessed by a spirit.
Kabaddi champion of the village, Jind raises her son to be the most honest and reputable player. Unfortunately, the son gets addicted to drugs, threatening to destroy himself and his mother.
The rampant use of an illegal backdoor route called 'Donkey Flight' by Indians to immigrate to countries like Canada and USA.
Naseeb, a newly-wedded woman, must help her sister-in-law, Guddi, to marry her love, Manjinder, and reunite her husband's broken family.
A young gangster, along with his uncle, attempts to outsmart the head of a dreaded crime family that deals with drugs. Chaos ensues as both the gangs go against each other in the lust for power.
A love story centers around soft and pure-hearted Rabia, who is later tortured by a male-dominated society.
Nikka Zaildar is a 2016 Punjabi romantic comedy film directed by Simerjit Singh, written by Jagdeep Sidhu, and starring Ammy Virk and Sonam Bajwa as the main lead roles.
Carry On Jatta 3 is an upcoming Indian Punjabi-language comedy film directed by Smeep Kang and produced by Humble Motion Pictures.
Sundeep is married to two women, Anu and Jasmeet, who are unaware of each other. Chaos ensues when a man who knows Sundeep's secret decides to marry his sister.
A young Sikh fights for equality and struggles to escape the clutches of the police as he protects the society from crime and corruption.
Nirmal Singh invites trouble when he gets married for the second time to his first wife's sister just because he cannot conceive a child.
Two friends, Dharmaya and Sohan Lal, are inseparable. Their friendship takes a nasty turn when Sohan Lal rapes Dharmaya's servant and tries to run away.
Banjara is a 2018 Indian Punjabi-language drama film directed by Mushtaq Pasha. The film stars Babbu Maan, Rana Ranbir, Gurpreet Bhangu, Jia Mustafa and Shraddha Arya.
Two brothers share a strong bond and go to great lengths to support and protect each other. However, when an argument breaks out between the elders, the brothers bear the brunt of it and drift apart.
Lucky lives a carefree life along with his three friends until he meets and falls in love with Seerat. However, a series of unfortunate circumstances keep them from getting married.
A man is desperate to find a match because of his increasing age, but makes everyone uncomfortable and gets into trouble every time he meets a gorgeous girl.

Drama.Description: Ranjha, along with his uncle, travels to Thailand on a special mission, where he meets with Juliet, who belongs to a rich family. He falls for her and faces many obstacles to win her love.
Lucky's mother sets out on a mission to look for the right girl to marry him. When everything seems to be on track, the world is suddenly hit by the unfortunate Coronavirus pandemic.
Amidst love, passion, hatred and romance set in a university campus, the movie highlights the plight of students when politicians get involved in student elections for their own benefit.
Darra is a simple man whose life changes when he returns to his village after completing his education. When the villagers decide to elect him as the sarpanch, his family objects.
Manga Singh Antal is a young athlete who falls prey to drugs and gets involved in criminal activities. Furthermore, these actions sabotage his sanity and relationships.

Amrit, a carefree young boy living in Canada, falls in love with Nimrat but as time passes, their love story goes through various ups and downs. Will they be able to resolve their issues and find a happy ending?
Successful businesswoman Zoe Reynard (Sharon Leal) seems to have a charmed life. She has a wonderful, loving husband (Boris Kodjoe), two beautiful children and a thriving career.
Shiva and Parshuram, two criminals, are arch-rivals and their enmity worsens when Shiva marries Parshuram's daughter. Due to their rivalry, their city is in turmoil.

White Hill Studios proudly presents the official trailer of the upcoming Punjabi movie "LEKH" Starring Gurnam Bhullar and Tania releasing worldwide on 1st April. Directed by Manvir Brar.Story by Jagdeep Sidhu.

Qismat ( transl. Destiny) is a 2018 Punjabi romantic drama film written and directed by Jagdeep Sidhu. Produced by Shri Narotam Ji Productions, the film stars Ammy Virk and Sargun Mehta in lead roles along with Guggu Gill, Tania and Harby Sangha in supporting roles.
During the partition of India, three families from different communities get accommodated in the same house. Later, things get more complicated as the members get romantically involved.
Jeet, a carefree young man, and Teg, a poor labourer working in the fields, fall in love with each other. However, they face several difficulties to maintain their relationship.
A man uses illegal methods to go abroad and set up a life for himself. However, his decision causes a lot of problems for him.
This story revolves around Panchhi, who is psychologically distressed and wants happiness in life. However, his life takes a turn when he is charged with murdering a girl whom he loves.

Roop Kaur had to go to Canada due to some family reasons, leaving behind her childhood friend Pala. After 20-25 years, she doesn't remember much about him and because of the name Pala being so ambiguous in Punjab, it becomes a very chaotic task to find him.
Two prisoners, Jarnail Singh and Tarsem Lal, escape from prison on the day of Baisakhi. However, their troubles increase when they learn that they were to be pardoned by the jail minister.

MovieSlider.Movie_name: Kade Dade Diyan Kade Pote Dian
